text: This place is closed. There are For Rent signs in the windows, and no info about a new location

This place was very good, to the writers below just incase u were wondering if he moved location? The answer would be no, he actually moved back home, there were new owners that took over but their food wasn't good so that's why it prolly didn't last.

This is our favourite roti shop in the area. We prefer the chicken (boneless) to the beef. 

The one time that we tried their doubles, we found them too salty.
